scripts.dev: npm run build -w @crocdesk/shared && concurrently "npm run dev:shared" "npm run dev:server" "npm run dev:web" "npm run dev:desktop"
scripts.dev:e2e: concurrently -k "cross-env CROCDESK_DATA_DIR=.e2e-data npm run dev:server" "npm run dev:web"
scripts.build: npm run build -w @crocdesk/shared && npm run build -w @crocdesk/server && npm run build -w @crocdesk/web && npm run build -w @crocdesk/desktop
scripts.typecheck: npm run typecheck -w @crocdesk/shared && npm run typecheck -w @crocdesk/server && npm run typecheck -w @crocdesk/web && npm run typecheck -w @crocdesk/desktop
